S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4694: Build breaks on Mac OS X due to JDK classpath issues
Relaxed verification criteria for Apple JDKs (skip check for Headers directory). Added flag -DprintCompilerPropertiesVerbose to aid debugging when the property setter fails to set the correct compile classpath(s).
Patch file: derby-4694-2b-debugging_and_mac_fix.diff
